title: Lead Android Developer - Fast growing, wellness + health App NEW!
full_description: Lead Android Developer - Fast growing, wellness + health App Lead Android Developer - Fast growing, wellness + health App - Skills Required - Android, Kotlin, Java, Android Studio, RESTful API, 3RD Party API Integration, Microservice architecture, JNI, NDK, Javasript / JSONIf you are a Senior Software Engineer, Technical Lead with a solid background in Android development and interested in impacting a team where you lead projects, teams, extend features and improve performance, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with Us1. We're building products that serve a good cause - deliver health, medicine + wellness to our users 2. We're building software that, if done successfully - changes lives for the better 3. We are addressing a healthcare market of 50+ billion dollars and barely scratching the surface stillWhat You Will Be DoingLeading a team responsible for developing critical application features With your knowledge of Java / Kotlin / Android Architecture - participate in the design, development and deployment of critical features Working in collaboration w/ other engineers, stakeholders, and Product Managers to ensure that the product continues to take on our most critical requests, improve application performance and add valuable featuresWhat You Need for this PositionAt Least 3 Years of experience and knowledge of: Android - Kotlin - Java - Android Studio - RESTful API - 3RD Party API Integration - Microservice architecture - JNI - NDK - Javasript / JSONWhat's In It for You Vacation/PTO - Medical - Dental - Vision - Relocation - Bonus - 401kSo, if you are a Senior Software Engineer / Technical Lead with Android Development and Architecture experience (Java + Kotlin), please apply today!Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.*Lead Android Developer - Fast growing, wellness + health AppCA-San DiegoAF-1517379*
